title: Real Families
description: The show that spends a week with a new family and asks the question, “Hey America, who are you, really?”
quote: Look, it’s unfortunate. But it’s real.
altHero: hosts Phil Tarry and Elaine Parker
alt1: Elaine Parker speaking to the camera
alt2: Phil Tarry next to a photo of a family
alt3: a family waking up in bed
alt4: the family on stage with Phil and Elaine
